headline: Carrier Unveils AI-Powered Abound Platform Upgrade for Smarter Building Management
summary: Carrier today introduced a major upgrade to its award-winning Abound Insights platform, delivering advanced AI-powered capabilities that empower building operators to efficiently manage operations, optimize resources, and simplify maintenance across their portfolios. Carrier Abound is part of Carrier Global Corporation (NYSE: CARR), global leader in intelligent climate and energy solutions.
